title: about us
description:
Bent Oak Systems was funded in summer 2016 in London, UK.
 
At the time we were a few Iranian professionals working for big international corporates and every time we met we had some exciting idea about a new app. But we lacked __the production line __for the ideas, and the contractors we found were either expensive or low-quality (and in both cases: not affordable).
 
 We decided to create the production line. Amin had the right motives and opportunities to move back to Iran and create the team, and after a few months we had a team.
